channel.title: Comments on: Demolished with a Silver Lining

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: What a great idea! I'll definitely put that on the to-do list!
item.content:encoded: What a great idea! I’ll definitely put that on the to-do list!

item.title: By: Devin Flake
item.dc:creator: Devin Flake
item.description: I like watching batt's youtube videos - I hope you'll post a review about it :)
item.content:encoded: I like watching batt’s youtube videos – I hope you’ll post a review about it ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: That means a lot coming from you man. I actually thought my whole board ended up pretty wacky for that game; but perhaps I am being my own worst critic. frozensoul is my sensei. Haha. And yes it is a he (who is in high school for that matter xD). But in all honesty, I am glad to have found someone who matches my style after trying out many different teaching styles. =D
item.content:encoded:
That means a lot coming from you man. I actually thought my whole board ended up pretty wacky for that game; but perhaps I am being my own worst critic.
frozensoul is my sensei. Haha. And yes it is a he (who is in high school for that matter xD). But in all honesty, I am glad to have found someone who matches my style after trying out many different teaching styles. =D

item.title: By: Nate Eagle
item.dc:creator: Nate Eagle
item.description: It was an intense game. I'm not sure whether to be grateful that most of my games are a little less intense, or to wish that they were because you definitely push me to try to play my absolute best game. I can't deny that I'm proud and relieved to have won a game that wasn't due to a last-minute miracle - I have immense respect for your whole-board thinking and your attacking ability. Is frozensoul your sensei? He (?) is really cool - he was generous enough to stick around after our game and give me a lot of comments in review. You're really lucky to have found someone like that to teach you.
item.content:encoded:
It was an intense game. I’m not sure whether to be grateful that most of my games are a little less intense, or to wish that they were because you definitely push me to try to play my absolute best game. I can’t deny that I’m proud and relieved to have won a game that wasn’t due to a last-minute miracle – I have immense respect for your whole-board thinking and your attacking ability.
Is frozensoul your sensei? He (?) is really cool – he was generous enough to stick around after our game and give me a lot of comments in review. You’re really lucky to have found someone like that to teach you.
